#Opg. 1

Gradienten er

$\begin{bmatrix} \frac{1}{n} \sum_i^n 2(a + bs_i - d_i) \\ \frac{1}{n} \sum_i^n 2(a + bs_i -d_i)s_i \end{bmatrix}$




```{r Opg. 1}
ab <- c(1,1)
n <- 50
ms <- function(ab) {
  ab[1] + ab[2] * cars$speed
}

f_i <- function(ab) {
  (ms(ab) - cars$dist)^2
}

f <- function(ab) {
  1/n * sum(f_i(ab))
}

d_f <- function(ab) {
  grad(f,ab)
}

dd_f <- function(ab) {
  hessian(f,ab)
}

backtrack <- function(a_bar = 3, rho = 0.3, c = 0.2, func = f, Dfunc = d_f, x_k = ab) {
  a <- a_bar
  itt <- 0
  while ( (func(x_k + a * (-Dfunc(x_k)) ) ) > (func(x_k) + c * a * t(Dfunc(x_k)) %*% (-Dfunc(x_k))) ) {
    itt <- itt + 1
    a <- rho * a
  }
  a
}

#steepest descent
optimer_identitet <- function(x_0 = ab) {
  x_k <- x_0
  a_k <- 2
  itt <- 0
  steps <- c()
  while (norm(t(d_f(x_k))) > 1e-5) {
    itt <- 1 + itt
    p_k <- -d_f(x_k)
    a_k <- backtrack(a_k, rho = 0.5, c = 0.001, f, d_f, x_k)
    x_k <- x_k + a_k * t(p_k)
    steps[itt] <- a_k
    if (itt == 100000) {
      break
    }
  }
  cat("x* = ", x_k, "f(x*) =", f(x_k), "iteration =", itt, "steps = ", steps[1:5])
}
optimer_identitet()


#newton
optimer_newton <- function(x_0 = ab) {
  x_k <- x_0
  a_k <- 2
  itt <- 0
  steps <- c()
  x_plot <- c()
  f_plot <- c()
  plot(dist ~ speed, cars)
  while (norm(t(d_f(x_k))) > 1e-5) {
    itt <- 1 + itt
    p_k <- solve(dd_f(x_k), -d_f(x_k))
    a_k <- backtrack(a_k, rho = 0.5, c = 0.01, f, d_f, x_k)
    x_k <- x_k + a_k * t(p_k)
    if (itt %% 50 == 0) {
      abline(x_k)
    }
    steps[itt] <- a_k
    if (itt == 100000) {
      break
    }
  }
  cat("x* = ", x_k, "f(x*) =", f(x_k), "iteration =", itt, "steps = ", steps[1:5])
}
optimer_newton()


optim(ab, f, hessian = TRUE)
```
